name: Recipe Cards
description: Auto-generated, printable application recipe cards saved to jobs for crew reference.

prd.problemStatement: Crew members need clear, printable instructions for chemical and fertilizer applications including products, rates, mixing, and safety information.
goals: Auto-generate recipe cards from application plans
Provide printable format for field use
Include all necessary safety and mixing information
Save recipes to job records for compliance

successMetrics.metric: Application errors due to unclear instructions

userStories: As a crew member, I want clear recipe cards so that I apply products correctly
As a superintendent, I want recipes auto-generated so that I save time on documentation
